title: Behind The Idea # 6: The Tile Shop Hits The Floor
description:
Everyone loves a comeback story, but do they actually work in investing? Behind The Idea looks at Michael Rogus's argument (https://seekingalpha.com/article/4151019-tile-shop-value-left-shares) that The Tile Shop can turn things around, as well as why retail turnarounds can be such a graveyard for investors. 
Topics covered:
A review of TTS's unhappy 2017 (1:30)
Breaking down Rogus's TTS article (4:30)
The elephant in the room (Amazon (AMZN)) and a potential fence against it (14:40)
